steps: (Optional) Saute onion and garlic in olive oil in Instant Pot on saute mode for 2-3 minutes
Add red lentils, carrots, tomatoes, spices, guajillo chile (if using), and broth
Cook on high pressure for 8 minutes
Optional: Blend partially or fully for creamy texture (remove chile first)
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Serve with lime juice, olive oil drizzle, and cilantro
title: Red Lentil Caldo with Mexican Spices
